title: Transformative Leadership Ed.D.  · Angelo State University
description: By earning your Ed.D. in Transformative Leadership 100% online at Angelo State, you can become a leader in your organization to impact and inspire change.

headings: Become the transformative leader you are meant to be.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With an Ed.D. in Transformative Leadership?
Why Earn My Doctor of Education Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our program prepares transformative leaders within institutions and organizations through a relevant and progressive curriculum to encourage growth and development, promote trust and collaboration, and cultivate innovative change.

Our 100% online courses are offered in a combination of 8-week and 16-week formats focused on transformative leadership and research applications for diverse institutions and organizations. We also host an annual on-campus residency conference and virtual orientation to complement the online course format. Structured dissertation supports keep you on track to degree completion.
Our online Ed.D. program prepares leaders to inspire, transform and advocate within a diverse array of institutions and organizations. Our three primary goals are to:

Our faculty are experienced educators and administrators in their field. Through their purposeful mentorship and instruction, you will develop advanced knowledge and skills, preparing you to confront the challenges of today’s leaders.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Our program prepares leader-scholars to become agents for change in education, healthcare, the private sector, small businesses, nonprofit agencies and other industries.

From the moment you apply until you complete your dissertation and graduate, we’re with you every step of the way. Our small cohorts ensure a high level of individualized support, and we have multiple resources available to you.
Our program enrolls students from many different industries and fields. While the program has its roots in education, our coursework and experience are designed to support leaders in all fields.

The doctoral experience provides leadership theory and research frameworks to enhance how you approach your professional work. You will be able to immediately apply what you are learning in your organizations – either through how you lead and inspire others, how you use data and research in problem-solving, or how you advocate for the communities you serve.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.

Prepare and inspire leaders within institutions and organizations, from local to global, through a relevant and progressive curriculum.
Provide leaders a research foundation to contribute to the field of research and promote transformative applications of research.
Provide the regional job market with transformative leaders who possess advanced knowledge and skills to advocate in a multicultural work environment.

Committed to Your SuccessWhether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research.
